chrome_extension_description.message: Lets get better access to the sites. Encrypts traffic. It allows you to open blocked sites.

messErrOverExtProxy.message: is not enabled, the proxy is managed by a different extension

messLists.message: Set up a list of sites

messListsAdd.message: Add your own lists of sites

messListsAlgDesc.message:
Better add at once domain subdomains, for example: *.twitter.com instead of twitter.com.
When using the analytical algorithm you should choose to check, this can be the small images on the website, which is being tested.

messListsConfirmDelList.message: You delete the list. Are you sure?

messListsConfirmDelNoEmptyList.message: You remove a non-empty list. Are you sure?

messListsConfirmDelSite.message: You remove the site from the list:

messListsFileNotFound.message: At this address file not found, check the 'URL to access checks'

messListsNoAlg.message: this validation algorithm is not suitable for this site, and select a different algorithm

messListsSiteUrlAlrIs.message: Already have this site in the list

messListsSiteUrlAlrIs2.message: This site is already present in the list

messListsSiteUrlAlrIs3.message: It is not necessary to add.

messListsSomethingHappened.message: something seems to have happened, then try the request again after a couple of seconds

messOptListAlrIs.message: Already have the list with the same name

messOptListFormat.message: Wrong format of the list name. Must consist of letters, digits, _-

messProxy.message: through friGate.

messUpdate.message:
upgrade to
the latest version!

mess_autochproxy.message: Choose the proxy automatically if the site is not available or an error occurred.

mess_isadv.message: Do not show ads. Disabling advertising, you do NOT HELP the development of the project!

mess_isalert.message: do not notify me that the site is available through the extension and enabled or disabled at the moment proxy for a specific site. Attention, and you can not turn a proxy for a particular page!

mess_isanon.message: Enable anonymous. Enable only if the site is blocked, even through a normal proxy. Must be provided by a third-party DNS (for example 8.8.8.8).

mess_iscompress.message: Enable optimization PageSpeed Google. Works only when traffic goes through the proxy.
